events.name: Singapore SharePoint Community Meeting - September 2015
events.description: Hi All, For this month's SharePoint Community event we will have two sessions: Building a Responsive SharePoint Site with BootstrapMatt Lee, SynergyIn this session, Matt will explain how Synergy developed a fully responsive SharePoint 2013 site including master pages and page layouts incorporating the Bootstrap framework and other mobile-friendly technologies. SharePoint 2016 Preview Installation WalkthroughMilan Gross, SynergyIn this session we will take our first look at the SharePoint 2016 product preview and walk through the installation process comparing it to the SharePoint 2013 installation process.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Book Club: High Performance Browser Networking
events.description:
We're going to be working through this highly-regarded book by Google engineer, Ilya Grigorik: High Performance Browser Networking: What Every Web Developer Should Know about Networking and Web Performance  


This week we'll be covering Chapter 17: WebSocket Please read the chapter before you come to the meetup! Book club is held at Tim & Wei's residence: 244A Tanjong Katong RdSingapore  437032Singapore Doors open at 6:30, meetup starts at 7. Feel free to ask questions in the SingaporeJS gitter room: https://gitter.im/SingaporeJS/discussions
events.location: Tim & Wei's Residence, 244A Tanjong Katong Road, Singapore

events.name: Gophers meetup #10 - Sept 2015 Tuesday
events.description:
Next month's meetup will be held at PayPal Singapore. 


Deployment Night Speakers: Go deployments with 1. Loh Siu Yin: Docker 2. Chang Sau Sheong: Google App Engine and Heroku 3. Kai Hendry: systemd - 10 min pop quiz with sponsored prize.  Pizzas and drinks are kindly sponsored by PayPal Singapore at around 7pm.
events.location: PayPal Singapore, Suntec City, 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985
